data.title: Saahasam Swaasaga Saagipo (2016)
data.meta_description: A couple on a road trip across the country are thrown into a situation that is beyond their control.
data.text:
Saahasam Swaasaga Saagipo was a movie that I had been waiting for ever since it was announced. I was really excited for it since a movie directed by Gautham Vasudev Menon starring Naga Chaitanya, the combo of Ye Maaya Chesave was back! Due to financial troubles for Gautham Menon and release problems for the Tamil version because of STR (who sucks when compared to Chay), SSS was postponed by almost a whole year :( .

When SSS finally came out, I thought it was good, but I felt that Premam was a much better movie as a whole. I loved the second half of SSS and I thought Chay's performance was his best ever in the second half. I didn't…

This is a really good movie that would have been a great movie if Gautham Menon casted anyone else in the heroine role. No offense to Manjima Mohan but she can't really act and it felt like Naga Chaitanya was doing all the work in selling the romance. The only reason her perfomance worked for me at all was because of Chinmayi's dubbing to be honest. It's been a while since I've seen this movie so I forgot how good of a performance he gave in this movie. Gautham Menon's films have been a mess lately but I would love to see Naga Chaitanya work with him again just because he tends to bring the best out of him. Rahman's…
